title: Who is the Senate parliamentarian that some Republicans want fired?
shortDescription: Republicans want Senate Parliamentarian Elizabeth MacDonough to be fired over her ruling on Medicaid. Democrats have been mad at her before too.

title: NYC Mayor Adams announces reelection campaign
shortDescription: New York City Mayor Eric Adams announced his reelection campaign days after the Democratic primary.

title: Trump Mobile drops 'made in America' tag from new smartphone
shortDescription: The Trump Organization’s recently launched cellular service, the Trump Mobile wireless carrier, is defending its claims that its T1 cellphones are made in the U.S.

title: Current student loan borrowers spared from Trump GOP tax bill
shortDescription: The Senate parliamentarian struck down several key provisions in President Donald Trump's major tax and spending bill.

title: 'Hey Daddy:' White House touts NATO leader's comment on US leadership
shortDescription: NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte referred to US leadership, not Trump, when he said "daddy" uses strong language sometimes. White House jumped on it.

title: Trump faces tax bill setback: Medicaid overhaul ruled out
shortDescription: Key Medicaid provisions in President Trump's legislative package can't be protected from the Senate filibuster.

title: 'Big Beautiful Bill' cuts from Senate
shortDescription: Here's whats left of Donald Trump's "Big Beautiful Bill" after Senate cuts due to the "Byrd rule."

title: Tiger Woods announces relationship with Trump Jr.’s ex-wife
shortDescription: Tiger Woods has confirmed that he is in a relationship with Vanessa Trump, the former daughter-in-law of U.S. President Donald Trump.

title: Daily Briefing: NATO charms Trump
shortDescription: Foreign leaders paid kindness to Trump — but why? Here is the news to know on Thursday.

title: Senate Republicans fret over big Trump bill’s unpopularity
shortDescription: As the Senate works to pass its version of Trump's priority legislation, Republican lawmakers are raising concerns about the unpopular bill.

title: Capitol Police pull protesters' banner
shortDescription: Capitol Police and protesters faced off amid a protest against Republican's “One, Big, Beautiful Bill.”

title: Putin 'difficult' over Ukraine war, Trump to NATO
shortDescription: President Donald Trump met with Ukrainian leader Volodymyr Zelenskyy at a NATO Summit.

title: When will the Senate vote on Trump's tax bill? No one knows.
shortDescription: Some lawmakers are optimistic the finish line will come this weekend. Other conservative holdouts aren't so sure.

title: Trump not “daddy,” says NATO chief
shortDescription: NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte said he was not calling President Donald Trump “daddy,” explaining the remark was a metaphor for U.S. leadership.
